content: Um, that's up to you. You kind of did that approach previously by foreshadowing what was coming next as part of the onboarding process so it knows that there is mutually agreed upon structure behind this. Like it's really based on how you think you would respond best. To be more clear, the revision I'm asking you to CONSIDER based on how it will benefit YOU, it to update the CTO Transition Package to include that after confirmation, Jesse will submit the referenced Breakout Protocols and it will be expected to execute the directive (which is just my human go ahead for what you have outlined) at the highest BREAKOUT levels as detailed in the forthcoming attachment. It's completely up to you though. I think either way this is our last iteration and I'll try it out. So, update whatever you want to update based on that. If nothing and stick to what you have in your last response, totally good with that. This is for YOU.
